messages.msgSnippet: Tomorrow! Wait a minute.... I m *still* behind. LOL! Barb E When I examine myself and my methods of thought, I come to the conclusion that the gift of fantasy
messages.messageBody:
Tomorrow! Wait a minute.... I'm *still* behind. LOL!


Barb E
"When I examine myself and my methods of thought, I come to the conclusion
that the gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing
positive knowledge."
-Albert Einstein

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4350
messages.msgSnippet: ROTFSMP! It was me! LOL! I did say I wanted you all to be quite for a day. ;-) Welcome Laura Barb E A poor fit between your passions and your work may be more
messages.messageBody:
ROTFSMP! It was me! LOL! I did say I wanted you all to be quite for a
day. ;-)

Welcome Laura


Barb E
"A poor fit between your passions and your work may be
more detrimental than a poor fit between the demands of
your job and your current abilities."

- Robert K. Cooper, Author in ³The Other 90%²




on 1/6/04 12:10 AM, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com at
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Subject: New to this list
>
> Just wanted to jump in and say hello, I am new to this list. I have to laugh
> because while looking for an unschooling list today I found this one first and
> joined and there were no archives, nothing.
>
> I see a few people I know here, Hi Barb and Laura B!
>
>
> So, hello,
> Laura in Ohio
